document_data.name: Order of Jhimari
document_data.mainbody: The Orders of [[Order of Jhimari|Jhimari]] and [[Order of Numos|Numos]] take proactive steps toward maintaining the peace by attempting to found a [[Dukar]] kingdom centered on [[Myth Nantar]] called [[Nantarum]].<ref name=tGHotR-p52>
